abilities.description: Can path over any terrain and deals 100% of your strength per second to units you are standing on top of.

additionalInformation: Deals damage as spell damage. This means it is affected by modifiers such as spell amp and spell lifesteal and is reduced by magic resistance.
This means it is affected by modifiers such as spell amp and spell lifesteal and is reduced by magic resistance.
name: Giant's Ring
description: Prized procurement of an otherwise unremarkable ruler of Elze who abdicated his position and vanished.
